attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LG3Fsfx3BYkHJ2xy-dG_description
attribs.current: You can speak telepathically to any creature within 30 feet of you. The creature understands you only if the two of you share a language. You can speak telepathically in this way to one creature at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFOnjjwPZwLDpoFP0fG_description
attribs.current: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFOngTQow66vDeiYTbA_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFOneCSMmDnmuDZtNST_description
attribs.current: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LG3ITTgLwUsRvTruw-I_description
attribs.current: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids. You can speak the language and use it to leave hidden messages. You and others who know this language automatically spot such a message. Others spot the message's presence with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check but can't decipher it without magic.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JVadF-mnjulGWJZj_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JVadF-mnjulGWJZj_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JVadF-mnjulGWJZj_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JZdPSEaZaecO4Oh7_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice exploded must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JZdPSEaZaecO4Oh7_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The cold damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above first.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LG3JfJ5aPEZi0f0yMCK_atk_desc
attribs.current:
Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice exploded must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.



At Higher Levels: The cold damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above first.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LG3JZdPSEaZaecO4Oh7_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Drop of water or piece of ice

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LG3M4USW-BqbpQ0cHVR_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range: 

  You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.
 You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
 You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot cube.
 You instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LG3M7tNHkDH6M1o9Z5h_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Make a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 1d6 piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller you pull it up to 10 feet closer to you.

This spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LG3O9hPAu6L84qWdIYW_spelltarget
attribs.current: Self or a creature within 30 feet of you

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LG3O9hPAu6L84qWdIYW_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A flickering flame appears in your hand. The flame remains there for the duration and harms neither you nor your equipment. The flame sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The spell ends if you dismiss it as an action or if you cast it again.

You can also attack with the flame, although doing so ends the spell. When you cast this spell, or as an action on a later turn, you can hurl the flame at a creature within 30 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage.

This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
-God-Complex
-Wise for his age due to his clans harsh raising of him
-Cruel to his enemies, otherwise generally kind and humorous.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current:
Despite his slight god complex, has pretty strong empathy for other characters, allowing him to understand their motivations and goals. As a result he will consider more when committing evil against good people, but will not hesitate ultimately.
Same applies to plants and animals.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Has a neutral or good perspective to just about every creature, mortal, plant or animal. Outside of his clan, nothing else specifically though.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Easily riled once doubting his capabilities,

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGBVFQD5gQ50EZQm6Fz_description
attribs.current:
When you choose this circle at 2nd level, you gain the ability to use Wild Shape on your turn as a bonus action, rather than as an action.

Additionally, while you are transformed by Wild Shape, you can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot to regain 1d8 hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGBVItbDER2guXtfSg9_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can use your Wild Shape to transform into a beast with a challenge rating as high as 1, but must abide by the other limitations there.

Starting at 6th level, you can transform into a beast with a challenge rating as high as your druid level divided by 3, rounded down.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LGBZDuX7lYSL8JLLtWT_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.

When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.
